titles.title: Revitalizing Rural Communities Act of 2025
Revitalizing Rural Communities Act of 2025
To extend and increase funding for the Rural Economic Development Loan and Grant Program of the Department of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Revitalizing Rural Communities Act of 2025
This bill reauthorizes the Department of Agriculture's Rural Economic Development Loan and Grant program through FY2030 to provide funding for rural projects through local utility organizations.
